name: Caminho Estreito
storyline:
The game tells the story of a young man who lives in the City of Doom but flees from there in fear of the troops of the Law, who want to hand him over to the court of the Wrath of the Almighty.

He hears about a place known as the Kingdom of Beatitudes, ruled by the Prince of Peace, who welcomes sinners. So he sets off on his journey but finds many challenges ahead. The emissaries of the Lord of Shadows lurk every step of the way, looking for a way to lead him astray or make him give up.

Armed with the Word of God and the shield of faith, embark on this incredible adventure towards the City of Eternal Freedom. Face the arguments of religionists, mystics, unbelievers, and pluralists, who will do anything to deceive you and try to convince you to abandon the journey. Also be prepared for strong opposition from demons, monsters, thieves, and the Devil himself.

"Everyone will hate you because of me, but the one who stands firm to the end will be saved."
(Mark 13:13)

On foot, on horseback, or by boat, across seas, forests, deserts, and plains. Along the way, demonstrate your faith by helping orphans and widows in difficulty, test your biblical knowledge, resist temptations, and proclaim the Gospel to the people you meet.
summary: Caminho Estreito is a Christian role-playing game where you will need to prove your biblical knowledge and show that your faith is unshakable.
